Parents,
Please be aware that Texas Education Code requires students to attend 90% of the days a course is offered to be awarded credit for the course and/or to be promoted to the next grade. This requirement remains in force during the 2020-21 school year. This requirement applies to both face-to-face and remote/virtual instruction. MISD students with more than four absences or six tardies may be assigned Monday Makeup School. Students assigned to Monday Makeup School will be required to complete four hours of work from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm. The Makeup School will be scheduled each month. It is important that your virtual student is logging on and working every day. It is important that you call the office if your face-to-face student is absent and that they check in with their teachers via their Meadow Schools email account or Google Classroom each day they are absent. Thank you.
